snippet: J. D. Martinez hit his first career grand slam, and Houston beat host San Francisco, 6-3, to avoid a three-game sweep one day after Matt Cain’s perfect game.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Houston Astros defeat San Francisco Giants, 6-3, to avoid three-game sweep; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: J. D. Martinez hit his first career grand slam, and Houston beat host San Francisco, 6-3, to avoid a three-game sweep one day after Matt Cain’s perfect game.

headline.main: Day After Giants’ Perfect Game, Astros Avoid Sweep
headline.print_headline: Day After Giants’ Perfect Game, Astros Avoid Sweep
